resources.string: Please use the link below to activate your account and set up a password.
Poruka sa informacijama za prijavu je poslana.
You cannot assign assets to a deleted account.
You have until {day} {month} {year}, {time} to respond before this link expires.
Your password has been changed. If you did not request a change to your password, contact your site administrator.
Somebody (probably you) has requested to reset your password. Please confirm this reset request using the link below.
Please confirm your password reset request
A confirmation message was sent. Please check your email and follow the instructions.
Your password has been set. If you did not request this, contact your site administrator.
Registrirani ste kao pridonositelj ovom site-u.
Greška: Članak ističe prije datuma objavljivanja.
The article was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Article not saved. {author} modified the article while you were editing it. If you’re sure, press the ‘Save’ button once more.
(Isti Naslov samo za-URL je korišten kod {count} drugih unosa).
The category was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Neispravan cookie. Molimo unesite logon detalje.
Theme {name} ({class}) failed to load properly from file {path}. The default theme will be used as a fallback.
Komentari za ovaj članak su istekli.
Browser cookies moraju biti dopušteni za uporabu Textpattern-a.
Ne mogu napraviti prijavu s tim imenom/lozinkom.
Sorry, the form could not be submitted. Please try again later.
I’m sorry. I’m afraid I can’t do that; {event} {step} is an unsafe operation.
Failed to write file to disk.
File upload stopped by PHP extension.
Datoteka prekoračuje maksimalnu veličinu postavljenu u Textpattern postavkama.
Datoteka prekoračuje upload_max_filesize nalog u php.ini.
Temporary direktoriji nije definiran, molimo osvježite Vaše napredne postavke.
Stil default se ne može izbrisati.
The style was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Style {name} not deleted; used by {count} section(s).
Clean URLs are only supported on Apache, use at your own risk.
You are running a development version of Textpattern on a live server.
Some Textpattern files have been modified
Apache module mod_rewrite is not enabled.
The following errors were detected in your MySQL tables
Some Textpattern files are out of date
Old placeholder file is in the way
Textpattern requires at least version {version} of PHP to be installed on your server
Site URL has a trailing slash
Site URL preference might be incorrect
The following PHP functions (which may be necessary to run Textpattern) are disabled on your server
New Textpattern version {version} available for download.
Temporary directory path and plugin cache directory path should not match.
Your version of PHP has known security vulnerabilities. Please turn register_globals off or update to a newer PHP version.
Ne možete bannati praznu IP adresu.
Komentari skriveni i markirani kao spam: {list}.
Komentari skriveni i markirani kao unmoderated: {list}.
Komentar ne postoji ili je izbrisan.
The comment was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Only spam comments found. Use ‘Show spam’ to view them.
Upozorenje: ne mogu zapisati u direktoriji {filedir}.
File {name} has become unsynchronised with the database. Please manually fix filename.
The form was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Image(s) {name} could not be completely deleted.
The image was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Upozorenje: ne mogu zapisati u direktoriji {imgdir}.
directory permissions need to be checked.
Import file not found. Please name the file import.txt and place it in /textpattern/include/import/.
Unesi sadržaj iz drugih publikacijskih alata
The page was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Page {name} not deleted; used by {count} section(s).
Loše formatiran ili neispravan kod plugina.
Plugin decompression is not supported by your server. Contact the plugin author for an uncompressed version.
Automatically adjust Daylight Saving Time setting?
Koristi raw editing mode po defaultu?
Za instalaciju novih jezika, možete ih prihvatiti sa {url} potom ih postavite u ./textpattern/lang/ direktoriji.
Compensate for persistent connection mod_deflate bug?
No locale available for language {name}. Using default locale instead.
Postoji kompletno nova verzija Textpatterna. Da li je želite probati?
Upotrijebi ISO-8859-1 encoding kod poslanih emailova (default je UTF-8)?
Ne mogu se spojiti na server da pregledam RPC datoteke. Molim probajte kasnije.
Send login details from this email address
Ne mogu se spojiti na server da pregledam osvježene jezične datoteke. Molim probajte kasnije.
Koliko unosa bi trebalo biti uključeno u feedove?
Prikaži broj unosa u tabu kategorija?
Spriječi riječi udovice, kod naslova unosa?
Postoji nova obnova za ovu verziju Textpatterna.
Koristi DNS lookup u logovima posjetitelja?
Koristi email za konstrukciju feed id-a (default je site URL)?
Komentiranje je zatvoreno za ovaj članak.
Vaš komentar čeka odobrenje. Bit će objavljen nakon dopuštenja.
Hvala što ste ostavili Vaš komentar.
Unesite Vaš komentar. Polja označena sa * su obavezna. Prije konačnog podnošenja morate pregledati svoj komentar.
Tagovi članka ne mogu biti upotrebljavani izvan konteksta članka.
Category tags cannot be used outside a category context.
Comment tags cannot be used outside a comment context.
File tags cannot be used outside a file context.
Image tags cannot be used outside an image context.
Link tags cannot be used outside a link context.
Section tags cannot be used outside a section context.
Predložak stranice {page} ne sadrži txp:article tag.
Trenutno nema komentara na ovaj članak.
Žao mi je, nema rezultata za vaš traženi pojam
Note: samo forme članka mogu biti pregledane.
(opens an external link in a new window)
Nastao je problem za vrijeme loadanja plugina:
Ovako će izgledati Vaš komentar. Nemojte zaboraviti spustiti se naniže i kliknuti podnesi gumb!
Izgleda da tražite veoma čest pojam, pokušajte sa spefičnijom frazom
You have the most up-to-date version of this Textpattern branch.
Vaša IP adresa je blacklistana od
The section was not saved due to an error. Please try again.
Section {name} not deleted; used by {count} article(s).
Upravo će te kreirati i napuniti tablice baze.
Izgleda da je Textpattern već instaliran. Ako želite čistu instalaciju, molimo maknite config.php iz vašeg /textpattern/ direktorija i pokušajte ponovno.
The contents of config.php do not match the values you entered. Please paste the exact text below.
The configuration file could not be found at the expected location {file}. Please verify its existence once again.
Create a file called config.php in the /textpattern/ directory and paste the following inside…
Ne mogu se spojiti na bazu
Baza {dbname} ne postoji ili predloženi korisnik nema potrebne privilegije.
Zapamtite da morate prethodno sami napraviti bazu podataka, Textpattern je neće napraviti.
There were {num} errors during the installation. You can ask for help in the Textpattern Support Forum.

For security, you should now remove the setup directory from your /textpattern/ directory. Please check the Admin Diagnostics panel from time to time for update announcements or troubleshooting hints.
Please provide a valid login name.
Neosporno, potrebno nam je nekoliko detalja…
Please go back, rectify any incorrect details and try this process again.
The table prefix {dbprefix} contains characters that are not allowed. The first character must match one of a-zA-Z_ and all following characters must match one of a-zA-Z0-9_.
(Koristi samo ako trebate više instalacija preko jedne baze)
There are 4 steps to this installation process:
Odaberite ime za prijavu (samo osnovni karakteri i razmaci)

Sorry, but Textpattern failed to find a writable directory to hold temporary files. Please visit the Preferences administration panel and adjust the Temporary directory path setting to suit your needs.
It appears the tables in {dbname} already exist. If you wish to continue setup, either delete the existing tables, or choose a different table prefix.
Hvala na Vašem interesu za Textpattern
To je prošlo dobro.Tablice baze su napravljene i popunjene.
Your PHP installation is missing the mail() function. Therefore no emails can be sent from Textpattern, which limits certain functionality.
Sad bi trebali imati pristup glavnom sučelju sa prijavom i lozinkom koje ste odabrali.
CSS klasa za aktivnu listu item-a
CSS klasa za break tag liste
Prikaži # numbers after the decimal point
Tekst to use for default section link
Link na listu ostalih unosa od ovog autora?
Link na listu ostalih unosa u ovoj kategoriji?
Link na listu ostalih unosa u ovoj sekciji?
Separator individualalnih unosa i imena site-a
